name: V or B ? - Helluva Boss Fan Dating Sim
name_original: V or B ? - Helluva Boss Fan Dating Sim
description:
I love both Blitzo AND Verosika ... but why is it so hard to choose one?!

lol, so I made a 5-10 minute dating sim about Helluva Boss that took maybe a bit over 24 hours to make. Not perfect, but does it have to be?

This was more of a test on visual novel making and uploading so I know it's not perfect and probably a bit too forward, but I think it's kinda cute in it's own way. :)

(Helluva Boss is owned and produced by Vivziepop on YouTube. I do not own any characters shown.)
